# animate

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

This package allows popular animation libraries to be easily used within R documents.

## Installation

The development version of animate can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:
